metadata.Title: CVE-2017-7480 on Ubuntu 18.04 ESM (bionic) - medium
metadata.Description:
rkhunter versions before 1.4.4 are vulnerable to file download overinsecure channel when doing mirror update resulting into potential remotecode execution.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2017-7480` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

rkhunter - 1.4.6-2
No subscription required

criterions.comment: rkhunter package in bionic, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '1.4.6-2').
